name: КВАС Imperium
description:
KBAC Imperium is a thrilling game where YOU get to be the export king of the beloved national Ukrainian beverage! Share your love of KBAC around the world! Pleasing art style and easy point and click mechanics makes this game fun for the whole family!

This game has been created during United with Ukraine Game Jam during 08-10.07.2022.

Created by

Krzysztof B Kiris
Maciej Maj bionicl
Adam Brol Grzybojad
Andrzej Brol Jumbocube

Music - Eric Matyas - soundimage.org
